abstract: From the International Herald Tribun archives: President Johnson announced plans to seek a world treaty banning all military activity on the moon, in 1966.

headline.main: 1966: U.S. Seeks Arms Ban on the Moon

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
